about_the_game:
Includes the Hover - Revolt Of Games Original Soundtrack with music by Hideki Naganuma and Cédric Menendez in MP3 format.

2 - Never 4ever - Hideki Naganuma

7 - Furtive Ascencion - Cédric Menendez
8 - Inner Reflexion - Cédric Menendez
9 - Greendy's Trance - Cédric Menendez
10 - Never Give Up - Cédric Menendez
11 - Surpassing Oneself - Cédric Menendez
12 - Underground - Cédric Menendez
13 - Grind-E's Secret Goal - Cédric Menendez
